articles.author: Mariana Alfaro
articles.title: Trump administration says it is paying out half of November’s SNAP benefits - The Washington Post
articles.description: The administration will release funds to help pay for SNAP benefits, following court orders to avoid food insecurity for almost 42 million Americans.
articles.content: The Trump administration said Monday that it will release enough funds to pay for a half-months worth of food assistance benefits in November, days after two courts ordered the U.S. Department of Agr… [+95 chars]
